description: A medical content review platform for educational materials including flashcards and MCQs

requirements.title: Authentication System
requirements.description: Users must be able to sign in with development credentials
acceptance_criteria: User can sign in with any email address
Session is maintained across page navigation
Protected routes redirect to sign-in when not authenticated

requirements.title: Review Queue Management
requirements.description: Reviewers can view and manage items in the review queue
acceptance_criteria: Items are displayed in a grid layout
Items can be filtered by subject, type, status, and quality flags
Item status can be updated (approve, request changes, send back)
Quality indicators are displayed for each item

requirements.title: Item Detail View
requirements.description: Reviewers can view detailed information about individual items
acceptance_criteria: Item details include question, answer, references, and auto-checks
Action buttons allow status updates
References are properly linked and displayed
Auto-check results are clearly shown

requirements.title: Content Intake System
requirements.description: New content can be submitted for review
acceptance_criteria: Flashcards can be created with question and answer
MCQs can be created with options and correct answer
Form validation prevents invalid submissions
Bulk upload supports multiple items

requirements.title: Journal System
requirements.description: Reviewers can maintain notes and observations
acceptance_criteria: Notes can be created and saved
Note history is displayed chronologically
Notes can be linked to specific items
Notes persist across sessions

requirements.title: Analytics Dashboard
requirements.description: Review metrics and quality indicators are displayed
acceptance_criteria: Total items and status counts are shown
Subject and type distribution charts are displayed
Quality indicators (duplicates, conflicts, coverage) are tracked
Data is updated in real-time

requirements.title: API Endpoints
requirements.description: Backend APIs support all frontend functionality
acceptance_criteria: All API endpoints return proper HTTP status codes
Data is returned in correct JSON format
Error handling provides meaningful messages
Authentication is properly enforced

requirements.title: Auto-Check System
acceptance_criteria: Duplicate detection identifies similar content
Coverage analysis evaluates reference completeness
Bloom taxonomy classification is applied
Competency mapping suggests appropriate subjects
